name: D365DataImport
description: Import data into a Dynamics 365 instance from an xml file created with the Dynamics 365 Data Export tool.
author: NMEDIA

inputs.name: ConnectionString
inputs.label: Dynamics 365 connection string
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection string of the Dynamics 365 instance in which you wish to import data.

inputs.name: AttributesExcluded
inputs.label: Attributes to exclude from the import

inputs.name: File
inputs.label: Path of the file to import

inputs.name: EntitiesOnlyCreate
inputs.label: Entities not to update if already in the targeted instances
